content.rendered:
List of live CAGBC events

Explore the latest CAGBC live events, happening online or in person.

Low Carbon Training Foundations

Delivered in three ways (live webinars, in-person events, and online on-demand), this free course will equip the people and businesses involved in green buildings with a common language and understanding of low-carbon strategies and solutions.

Live Webinars

February 15
10:00 a.m- 4:30 p.m ET

Register

March 2
10:00 a.m- 4:30 p.m ET

Opening soon

In-person

Vancouver – February 6
8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. PT
Pinnacle Hotel Harbourfront
1133 West Hastings Street, Vancouver

Register for Vancouver

Calgary – March 5
8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. MT
Delta Hotels by Marriott Calgary Downtown
209 4 Avenue Southeast Calgary

Register for Calgary

Other Live Events:

LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

February 20, 2024 – February 29, 2024

Registerfor LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

April 23, 2024 – April 25, 2024

Registerfor Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

May 7, 2024 – May 16, 2024

Registerfor LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

May 14, 2024 – May 15, 2024

Registerfor Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

July 30, 2024 – August 8, 2024

Registerfor LEED Green Associate Exam Kickstarter

Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

September 16, 2024 – September 18, 2024

Registerfor Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

September 17, 2024 – September 19, 2024

Registerfor Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

November 25, 2024 – November 27, 2024

Registerfor Zero Carbon Building Standards Workshops

Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

November 26, 2024 – November 28, 2024

Registerfor Atelier Sur Les Normes Du Bâtiment À Carbone Zéro

CAGBC on-demand courses let you explore the essentials of green building at your pace.

LEARN MORE
